website_summaries.verdict: Super high-quality, amino-acid bound form of selenium.
pros: Loved by reviewers after researching competing brands
Excellent results for thyroid issues, detox, and increase in energy and mental clarity
cons: Just didn’t work for some consumers, though no adverse side effects

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: When a woman with a Ph.D. in pharmacy related in a video that she and others who have thyroid issues often experience hair loss, and that the problem that can be addressed with selenium supplements, I immediately ordered Selenomethionine. I think she may have mentioned this particular kind of selenium. After taking it for a week, I noticed a significant reduction in the amount of hair left in the shower drain after shampooing. Wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: 10 drops of Lugol's iodine (5% strenght) and NDT (Thyroid S in my case) and my thyroid is working like a healthy
customer_reviews.text: I take 1 of this, 1 vitamin E, 10 drops of Lugol's iodine (5% strenght) and NDT (Thyroid S in my case) and my thyroid is working like a healthy, normal one. Hashimoto patiences benefit greatly from this combination and non Hashimoto also, I'm down to 1 grain a day from 9 grains daily just by adding Selenomethionine, vit E and Iodine. The fist days you might feel the 3 kicking right into you thyroid for about 20-30 min, this is a sign you REALLY needed this combo and that your thyroid took what was absent.
customer_reviews.author: L. Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Works as other 5 stars reviewers stated.
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews here and decided to take this for my high stress job. Thank God I did. Normally, if I have a lot of stress, I can't work. I just stare and I can't make decisions. With this little tablet, I don't even care how much work I have. I'm productive, can prioritize projects, and I get stuff done. I take this first thing every morning. If you are seriously over your head in stress, take this, you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Theo Young

customer_reviews.title: I feel great!!
customer_reviews.text: I was in a downer mood for a long time. I started taking this, in additional to other supplements, as part of my thyroid therapy. Wow, what a difference. I feel great!!! I'm happy again :)
customer_reviews.author: ADAh

customer_reviews.title: Great for hypothyroidism
customer_reviews.text: I take this on an empty stomach together with Thorne Research Ultimate-E and my thyroid medication, and wait at least 30 minutes before eating. Vitamin E works synergistically with selenium, increasing absorption. Selenomethionine is the best-absorbed form of selenium. Since adding this to my thyroid medication, my dosage of thyroid has decreased significantly. Selenium helps convert T4 to T3.
customer_reviews.author: gigi*randeeni

customer_reviews.title: Pungent
customer_reviews.text: I take this as an antioxidant. I also have noticed less hair falling out in the shower. The only thing that is discouraging is the smell of this. It is very pungent. In order for me to get it down, I have to hold my breath and drink some turmeric with juice. That the the only way it is bearable for me. Other than that, good buy.
customer_reviews.author: D. I. F.

customer_reviews.title: My metabolism has kicked in and my thyroid is working better. I am feeling more energetic
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this on receommendation from my work out trainer. My metabolism has kicked in and my thyroid is working better. I am feeling more energetic.

customer_reviews.title: HOLY HAIR GROWTH!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff grew my hair like crazy in a very short period of time. LOVE IT!

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: This didn’t work for me at all. I have Hoshimotos & was hoping this would help improve my symptoms, but it hasn’t.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I began looking into supplements for my thyroid after my psychologist told me it could help with my depression/anxiety. This definitely gave me energy ! It was awesome, however ... I felt like my throat was closing. Such an odd/uncomfortable feeling so I’ve stopped using them.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler1224

customer_reviews.title: It helps a lot
customer_reviews.text: I used to have thyroid levels in the 4’s and was pre-diabetic. My recent bloodwork came back with my thyroid being in the 1’s. I’m still in shock and the only thing I’ve done differently is add this supplement to my regimen. I’m on my second bottle now; I notice I have an easier time getting up in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda T

customer_reviews.title: Small capsule and no fillers
customer_reviews.text: I like that the capsules are smaller than (half the size of) other brands because Thorne doesn't add additional "rice flour" or other fillers. Easy to swallow. Several practitioners I consulted recommended this particular Thorne Selenium supplement. I also recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: transparent

customer_reviews.title: Helps my thyroid
customer_reviews.text: I struggle with low thyroid here and there. I began taking this supplement, along with a vitamin e capsule, which makes selenium bio-available. The combination has made my blood thyroid panel come back perfect since I began taking it!
customer_reviews.author: J.M.

customer_reviews.title: I went through chemotherapy for breast cancer at age 46 ...
customer_reviews.text: I went through chemotherapy for breast cancer at age 46 and was instantly slammed into menopause. I was tested 4 times and declared to be post menopausal 4 times. I started taking selenium as a cancer preventative...and my monthly cycle returned!!!!

customer_reviews.title: IT ISNT FOR EVERYONE....

customer_reviews.title: This is the Selenium supplement that you want.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, high quality version of Selenium. This is the tyype you want, and not the cheap stuff available at GNC or from other cheaper brands online. I've used several products from this company and have been pleased with them all. You won;t regret buying this. Selenium is very important for detoxing the liver and body, and has even been shown to help cure deadly infections like Ebola and others.

customer_reviews.text: I like Thorne and use several products. My ferritin went from 18-25 over 4 months taking 1, 3x day. But then a friend told me about Ferocele. After taking it I went from 25-50 in 2 months. While this product works it doesn't work as well as another.

customer_reviews.title: Like I said they maybe effective as a supplement but ...
customer_reviews.text: This isn't so much about how effective the selenium is. I'm giving it a one star rating because I started gaining weight the day I started these. I couldn't figure out why my clothes were getting tighter everyday. After taking one every other day for a week and a half I must have gained 8 lbs. stopped and the weight gain stopped, not sure if the weight has gone though. Like I said they maybe effective as a supplement but I can't be doing with the weight gain.
customer_reviews.author: amd

customer_reviews.title: hypothyroidism can be reversed
customer_reviews.text: I reversed my hypothyroidism. I made several changes at once, so I can't say it was all because of this product, however, I believe it made a huge difference I can tell a difference, when I skip doses. This product was recommended by a physician who teaches reversal of hypothyroidism. I can't find this type of selenium in the stores- even health food stores, so I buy it here, for a great price. Just be sure it doesn't sit in your mailbox, in the hot sun! Amazon will tell you exactly which day you can expect to receive it....I love Amazon!! Update: Just to avoid any confusion, this product is selenium
customer_reviews.author: linds

customer_reviews.title: The best kind of selenium for detoxing mercury
customer_reviews.text: This type of selenium is the one recommended by Dr. Bernard Jaffe for people who are trying to remove mercury and other toxic metals from their bodies. Most types of selenium become toxic themselves if taken in large doses, but according to Dr. Jaffe this one does not, and is the most effective at binding lead and mercury and helping the liver remove them from the body.
customer_reviews.author: Nils

customer_reviews.title: No side effects....quite effective!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My endocrinologist told me to take this for autoimmune thyroid issues. I do take this faithfully every day, and I have no idea if it’s working, honestly. But I know this is a reputable brand, and I have had no side effects from taking this, so I keep taking it in hopes it will be helpful. ***Update**** So, one year after starting Selenium, I received a NORMAL thyroid antibody blood test! While my Hashimotos is not severe, I always had at least mildly elevated numbers. After a year on selenium, I had my first normal test result ever. Try it!
customer_reviews.author: S. VanhooseTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: If you are searching for the right kind of selenium ...
customer_reviews.text: If you are searching for the right kind of selenium to supplement with and have an autoimmune disease or thyroid issues-this is exactly the kind you need-easily absorbed- I couldn't live with out it now that I've takin it for 2 months-Thorne makes quality supplements-and this is a really affordable price!
customer_reviews.author: momofcharlie

customer_reviews.title: Beware of selenium toxicity!
customer_reviews.text: I like the product but I just want to warn others - I had very bad side effects. If you get enough selenium in your diet be careful. It made me nauseous and gave me hot flashes. I'm assuming it was selenium toxicity because it went away once I stopped it. I gave the product to a friend and she likes it and does not have side effects. Good price. If you found this review helpful please click the helpful button :)
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and small capsules that are easy to swallow I have Hashimotos and take prescription T4 and T3. Adding this Selenium has finally gotten my thyroid antibodies from many thousands down to under 10 I wish doctors knew about proper treatment and lab tests for hypothyroid and for Hashimotos
customer_reviews.author: Ameenah

customer_reviews.title: Great for thyroid!

customer_reviews.author: G. Haining

customer_reviews.title: I’m alive again!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after running out of another brand of selenium. I love this! I noticed an immediate difference after taking this. My horrible fatigue was cut in half after only 1 dose. The other brand didn’t do much which is why I decided to switch. I make sure I don’t forget to take this each day!
customer_reviews.author: The Teer’s

customer_reviews.title: prefect dose, nice small capsules, VERY CLEAN, best form of selenium
customer_reviews.text: For me selenium is daily necessity because of my thyroid disease. This is the best form of selenium (selenomethionine) and the prefect dose at 200mcg. The 60 capsule bottle lasts two months and is very well priced for the dose and even better priced when you take into account how clean this product is when compared to others that have things like stearates in them that can possibly block absorption. The capsules are nice and small too.
customer_reviews.author: A. Woodmansee

customer_reviews.title: Essential for Hashi's Patients
customer_reviews.text: So everyone who has Hashi's and the internet knows she needs to take Selenium. There are a ton of options, and they range from super cheap to pricey. I feel like I've tried them all. However, I can say that Thorne's is the only one I recommend to women asking. Why? Because when I forget it for a few days, I can feel my symptoms return. The drain is full of lost hair, and the afternoons demand a nap. With it and my thyroid hormone, I feel nearly normal. That's why I say this is an essential for Hashi's sufferers.
